trans-unit.source: A modified version of Supybot (an IRC bot and framework)
trans-unit.target: 一个改良版的Supybot(一个IRC机器人和框架)。

trans-unit.source: A robust, full-featured Python IRC bot with a clean and flexible plugin API. Equipped with a complete ACL system for specifying user permissions with as much as per-command granularity. Batteries are included in the form of numerous plugins already written.
trans-unit.target: 一个强大的、功能齐全的Python IRC机器人,拥有一个简洁而灵活的插件API。配备了一个完整的ACL系统,用于指定用户权限,每个命令的颗粒度都很高。电池包含在已经编写的众多插件中。
